com.ahok.cuber.controller

Class AuthenticationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ahok.cuber.controller.AuthenticationController

  • @RestController
public class AuthenticationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Authentication Controller

    Class that manage users Authentications

    Available endpoints:

    • auth/token (Client login)
    • auth/client/register (Client Registration)
    • auth/driver/token (Driver login)
    • auth/driver/register (Driver Registration)

      • generateToken

        private java.lang.String generateToken(java.lang.String id,
                                       boolean isDriver)
                                throws com.auth0.jwt.exceptions.JWTCreationException
        Generate a JWT token for Client or Driver.
        Parameters:
        id - Token owner id.
        isDriver - Determine if the token will be generated for a Client or Driver.
        Returns:
        String token (JWT Token)
        Throws:
        com.auth0.jwt.exceptions.JWTCreationException - JWT encoding exception
